jitter.description: Jitter NQA test that tests UDP-packet jitter.

icmp-jitter-input.description: Enable/disable ICMP jitter test instance input.

lsp-ping-input.description: Enable/disable LSP ping test instance input.

lsp-trace-input.description: Enable/disable LSP trace test instance input.

lsp-jitter-input.description: Enable/disable LSP jitter test instance input.

pwe3-trace-input.description: Enable/disable PWE3 trace test instance input.

mac-ping-input.description: Enable/disable MAC ping test instance input.

arp-ping-ip-input.description: Enable/disable arp ping IP test intance input.

execution-policy.description: Statistics of the test instance execution policy.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-now-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-now-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-at-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-at-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

start-delay.description: Delay some time then execute testcase.

start-delay-seconds.description: The test instance start delay seconds.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-delay-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-delay-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

timeout.description: Time to wait for a response packet after a test packet is sent.

frequency.description:
Cyclic scheduling period of test cases. The frequency must be greater than the value of the following formula; otherwise, the test results may be inaccurate:
(number of sent packets - 1) * (packet sending interval) + (timeout period).

fail-percent.description: Indicates the packet loss ratio threshold of an NQA test instance. If the packet loss ratio exceeds the threshold, the test fails.

data-fill.description: Specify an NQA test packet payload string.

pass-route.description: Enable/disable the function of sending packets without searching for routes.

probe-fails.description: The maximum number of probe failures of an NQA test to send trap or events.

test-fails.description: The maximum number of the NQA test consecutive test failures to send trap or events.

compatibility.description: Enable/disable compatibility mode. When the ptn79 interworks with the ptn39, the no result is converted to failed and success.

result-num.description: The maximum number of test result records.

history-num.description: The maximum number of historical test records.

threshold-rtd.description: Threshold value of round trip delay.

hardware-enable.description: Enable/disable packets are sent by hardware.

data-fill.description: Specify an NQA test packet payload string.

pass-route.description: Enable/disable the function of sending packets without searching for routes.

threshold-owd-ds.description: One way delay threshold value from destination to source.

threshold-owd-sd.description: One way delay threshold value from source to destination.

threshold-rtd.description: Threshold value of round trip delay.

test-failtimes.description: The maximum number of the NQA test consecutive test failures to send trap or events.
